name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
role_name: Senior Machine Learning Engineer (GraphRAG & Retrieval Tools)
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Machine Learning Engineer with 8 years of experience in **Python**, **Pandas**, **PyTorch**, and **scikit-learn**. Specializing in innovative machine learning solutions including **Graph Data Science**, **Graph Neural Networks (GNNs)**, and **Link Prediction** techniques. Proven proficiency in designing and developing **Text-to-Query models** and **Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)** systems. My technical background is complemented by extensive experience with **FastAPI**, **Docker**, and API development, ensuring seamless integration and deployment of models.

I excel in building high-performance applications particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors, adopting best practices in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation. I have a strong customer-centric mindset, with a commitment to compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Additionally, I possess excellent collaboration and communication skills, which enable me to work effectively within cross-functional teams, driving impactful solutions that meet user needs.
